pageContext.claim: “If you [implemented Medicare-for-all], it would be lousy healthcare, really lousy healthcare. And I think you understand that very well.”
pageContext.analysis: Obviously, a transition to single-payer health care would lead to upheaval and uncertainty since it would encompass the entire health care system, not just the small piece covered by Obamacare. But other countries appear to manage with single-payer systems, at lower costs than the United States.
